ygData.subject: Internet Archive needs a world wide crawl tech lead
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, IA is hiring a tech lead for our new web crawling initiative.  You can read the job description here: http://www.archive.org/about/webjobs.php#wwcengineer

Hi,

IA is hiring a tech lead for our new web crawling initiative.  You can=
 read the job description here:

http://www.archive.org/about/webjobs.php#w=
wcengineer

If you're interested in the position, feel free to send your re=
sume directly to me at alexis[at]archive.org.

Thanks,
Alexis Rossi
